participant_1.background:
I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes.
my parents live across the street from me.
I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
i love to tell jokes.

participant_2.background:
I have a lot of friends who love to cook and eat, so I love to share my coupon finds with them!
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
i am the youngest of 4 children.
i wait tables at a cafe.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.

content.text: Hi! I'm going to a local Christmas concert. Do you like to go to concerts?
I do! I love going to concerts with my friends. We always have a great time.
That sounds fun! I'm going to the concert with my friend, but I'm not very good at singing.
That's okay! I'm not a very good singer either, but I still love to go to concerts.
Me too! I love the energy of a live concert.
Me too! It's so much fun to be surrounded by people who are all enjoying the same thing.
What's your favorite kind of concert to go to?
I love going to concerts of all kinds, but I especially love going to rock concerts.
Me too! I love the energy of a rock concert.
I do too! It's so much fun to be surrounded by people who are all feeling the same way.
I love how the music can bring everyone together.
Me too! It's a great way to connect with people.
